articles.title: Andrea Riseborough Isn’t the Reason Black Women Were Snubbed From Oscar Noms — The System Is - Variety
articles.description: It’s not Andrea Riseborough’s fault that zero Black women were nominated for best actress this year. Still, with no such representation for the second consecutive year, the “To Leslie” star’s surpr…
